talk.author: did:plc:yvl3nimvxzfnfhgrwrzahqn6
talk.utter: Do you think it helps his game playing Div 2 cricket for a not great Glamorgan team?

talk.author: did:plc:p7kjig5tdi7vtg7osqkz74sb
talk.utter: Probably not, to be honest. Suspect playing regularly in the Sheffield Shield would do him more good.

talk.author: did:plc:du7dr3yiq2olebjnllypb7lq
talk.utter:
No one is seriously judging him on English Div 2 cricket - that's just Ashes experience and a pay check, plus helping out County clubs. 

It's his form for QLD in the Shield people will be watching - on top of test digs.

talk.author: did:plc:yvl3nimvxzfnfhgrwrzahqn6
talk.utter: Apart from ££ I genuinely don't see how it helps him. He plays for a poor side on some sub-test standard wickets.

talk.author: did:plc:yvl3nimvxzfnfhgrwrzahqn6
talk.utter: Apart from ££ I genuinely don't see how it helps him. He plays for a poor side on some sub-test standard wickets.

talk.author: did:plc:du7dr3yiq2olebjnllypb7lq
talk.utter: The standard of bowling in the Shield is pretty high. There's plenty of blokes in there who would walk into the Aussie side if the bowling attack wasn't (usually) so solid.

talk.author: did:plc:yvl3nimvxzfnfhgrwrzahqn6
talk.utter: What's your view on shield cricket. If you took Surrey who've won the last 3 county championships and took on the best shield team who would win?
